name: CRED
description: CRED is a Bangalore-based fintech company that allows users to manage credit cards, make credit card bill payments, and rewards users for paying bills on time. It also provides services like rent payments, short-term credit lines, etc.

name: Digit Insurance
description: Digit Insurance is a digital first general insurance company from Bengaluru, offering simplified insurance solutions (auto, health, travel, commercial, bike etc.) with transparent policies and easy claims.

name: Udaan
description: Udaan is a B2B e-commerce platform founded in 2016 in Bengaluru that connects manufacturers, wholesalers, retailers and traders across India, operating across categories like FMCG, Pharma, Staples, Electronics etc., also offering financial services for business credit.

name: Pixxel
description: Pixxel is a space technology startup building hyperspectral imaging satellites for earth observation, with applications in agriculture, environment, mining etc., and aims to provide satellite-data platform services.

name: Kuvera
description: Kuvera is an Indian online wealth management & investment platform for mutual funds, fixed deposits, digital gold etc., now owned by Cred, aimed at helping users manage investments and savings digitally.

name: Zomato
description: Zomato is an online restaurant discovery and food delivery platform that connects customers with local restaurants and food outlets across India.

name: Groww
description: Groww is an investment platform simplifying mutual funds, stocks, ETFs, and gold investments with a mobile-first user experience targeting first-time investors.

name: Razorpay
description: Razorpay offers payment gateway services and business financial solutions including loans, payouts, and card issuing for Indian businesses.

name: PolicyBazaar
description: PolicyBazaar is an online platform for comparing and purchasing insurance policies spanning health, life, auto, and more, enhancing transparency for consumers.

name: Meesho
description: Meesho is a social commerce platform enabling small entrepreneurs and resellers to sell products through social networks and WhatsApp.

name: Swiggy
description: Swiggy is a leading food ordering and delivery platform connecting customers with restaurants and providing last-mile logistics solutions.

name: Skyroot Aerospace
description: Skyroot Aerospace is developing privately built Indian rockets for small satellite launches, pioneering liquid propulsion technology.

name: Agnikul
description: Agnikul is building Indiaâ€™s first 3D-printed rocket engines and small launch vehicles for satellite deployment.

name: Lenskart
description: Lenskart is an omnichannel eyewear retailer offering prescription glasses, sunglasses, and contact lenses with home eye check-ups.

name: Paytm
description: Paytm is a digital payments and financial services platform offering mobile wallets, UPI payments, banking, insurance, and investments services.

name: Nykaa
description: Nykaa is a leading beauty and cosmetics e-commerce platform featuring makeup, skincare, and personal care products.

name: Upstox
description: Upstox is an online discount brokerage platform providing stock trading, mutual funds, and investment services.

name: PharmEasy
description: PharmEasy is an online pharmacy and healthcare delivery platform providing medicines, diagnostic tests, and teleconsultations.

name: BoAt
description: BoAt is a consumer electronics brand focused on affordable audio products including earphones, headphones, and smartwatches.

name: Zerodha
description: Zerodha is Indiaâ€™s largest discount broker offering zero-commission stock trading and mutual fund investments.

name: Rivigo
description: Rivigo is a logistics startup using technology-driven solutions like relay trucking and real-time tracking to improve freight transport.

name: PhonePe
description: PhonePe is a digital payments platform offering UPI, wallet, bill payments, mutual funds, and insurance products.

name: Freshworks
description: Freshworks provides cloud-based customer engagement software including CRM, helpdesk, and marketing automation tools.

name: Darwinbox
description: Darwinbox offers a cloud-based human resource management system streamlining recruitment, attendance, payroll, and performance.

name: OfBusiness
description: OfBusiness is a B2B commerce platform providing working capital and supply chain finance solutions to small and medium enterprises.

name: ShopClues
description: ShopClues is an online marketplace focusing on value-for-money products across categories like electronics, fashion, and home essentials.

name: Jumbotail
description: Jumbotail is an online wholesale food and grocery supply platform for kirana stores and retailers.

name: Dunzo
description: Dunzo is an on-demand delivery startup offering package pickup, grocery delivery, food delivery and courier services.

name: Delhivery
description: Delhivery is a logistics services company offering parcel transportation, warehousing, and supply chain solutions across India.

name: BYJU’S
description: BYJU’S is a leading Indian edtech company offering online learning programs, test prep, and interactive classes for K-12 and competitive exams.

name: Unacademy
description: Unacademy is an online learning platform that offers courses, live classes and preparation for various competitive exams and skill development programs.

name: Vedantu
description: Vedantu is a live tutoring platform offering online interactive classes, doubt solving, and live learning sessions in India.

name: Toppr
description: Toppr is an online learning app for K-12 students providing video lessons, practice, and exam prep across India.

name: UpGrad
description: UpGrad is a higher education & upskilling platform offering certificates, degree programs, and skill learning in data science, tech, business, etc.

name: Pharmeasy Healthtech Diagnostics
description: A healthtech venture focusing on diagnostics, at-home sample collection, lab partnerships and test result delivery.

name: 1mg
description: 1mg is a digital health platform offering online medicine purchases, diagnostics, doctor consultations, and health information services.

name: Practo
description: Practo connects patients with doctors, offering online consultation, scheduling, prescriptions, and clinic services.

name: CureFit
description: CureFit is a wellness and health platform for fitness, mental health, healthy food delivery and preventive care.

name: Licious
description: Licious is a fresh meat & seafood direct-to-consumer brand offering online ordering and home delivery of high quality meats.

name: Zerodha (Coin)
description: Coin is Zerodha’s platform for direct mutual fund investments and portfolio management for Indian investors.

name: Infra.Market
description: Infra.Market is a construction tech startup aggregating procurement for building materials, reducing inefficiencies in supply chains.

name: Licious Fresh Foods
description: Focus on integrated food supply chain, from sourcing to delivery of perishable goods with cold chain infrastructure.

name: Delhivery (Express)
description: A division of Delhivery focusing on express parcel delivery and same-day/next-day logistics services.

name: Shadowfax
description: Shadowfax is a crowdsourced logistics platform that provides delivery, hyperlocal, and 3PL services for multiple verticals.

name: Rivigo (Relay Tech)
description: A tech arm of Rivigo developing relay trucking algorithms, predictive maintenance and fleet optimization tools.

name: LimeRoad
description: LimeRoad is a social shopping platform for fashion and lifestyle products, integrating social discovery and buying.

name: Fastrack
description: Fastrack (subsidiary of Titan) also experiments with smart wearables, youth fashion accessories and IoT gadgets for lifestyle.

name: FreshToHome
description: FreshToHome is an online marketplace for fresh fish, meat and other perishables, connecting farmers & suppliers directly with consumers.

name: Agritech-X
description: An agritech startup using IoT, drones, and satellite data to provide precision farming, farm advisory and yield forecasting.

name: CropIn
description: CropIn is a SaaS agritech company offering farm management software, predictive analytics and farm intelligence to agribusinesses.

name: Ninjacart
description: Ninjacart operates a fresh produce supply chain connecting farmers and retailers using technology for logistics optimization.

name: Ather Energy
description: Ather Energy designs, builds and operates electric scooters and a network of charging infrastructure in India.

name: Ola Electric
description: Ola Electric is the electric mobility arm of Ola, producing electric scooters and developing EV infrastructure across India.

name: Bounce
description: Bounce is a shared mobility startup that offers scooter rentals, battery swapping, and micro mobility solutions in cities.

name: Rapido
description: Rapido is an Indian ride-sharing / bike taxi platform connecting commuters in cities via 2-wheeler rides.

name: Delight Labs
description: Delight Labs builds educational gaming apps for children using AR/VR, puzzles and interactive storytelling.

name: Playabl
description: Playabl is a casual games platform that creates social, casual mobile games targeting Indian audiences.

name: Whatfix
description: Whatfix provides a digital adoption platform that helps users onboard, self-help and learn software via in-app guidance.

name: Postman
description: Postman is a collaboration platform for APIs, enabling developers to build, test, document, and monitor APIs.
